test_cases.name: address_extraction
test_cases.description: Extract structured address data from German address strings
test_cases.prompt_template:
Task: Extract address parts from a German address.

Rules:
1. Find the 5-digit ZIP code (Postleitzahl)
2. Find the city name (comes after ZIP code in German addresses)
3. Find the street with house number
4. Return ONLY a JSON object, no explanation

Input address: {input}

Output format (copy this structure exactly):
{{"zip_code": "XXXXX", "city": "CityName", "street": "StreetName Number"}}

Your JSON output:

test_cases.name: dno_name_extraction
test_cases.description: Extract DNO (Distribution Network Operator) name from search snippets
test_cases.prompt_template:
Task: Find the electricity network operator name.

Rules:
1. Look for company names containing: Netz, Netze, Stromnetz, Stadtwerke
2. Extract ONLY the company name (without GmbH, AG, etc.)
3. Return ONLY a JSON object, no explanation

Search result text: {input}

Output format (copy this structure exactly):
{{"dno_name": "CompanyName"}}

Your JSON output:
inputs: RheinNetz GmbH ist der Verteilnetzbetreiber für Strom und Gas im Raum Köln. Preisblatt Netzentgelte verfügbar.
Stromnetz Hamburg betreibt das größte städtische Verteilnetz für Strom in Hamburg.
Die Stadtwerke München Infrastruktur GmbH & Co. KG ist zuständig für das Münchner Stromnetz.
